articles.content: For her glam look, Urvashi opted for darkened brows, winged eyeliner, smoky eye shadow, mascara-laden lashes, smudged kohl-lined eyes, rouge on the cheekbones, highlighter on the contours and a shade… [+27 chars]

articles.title: Allu Arjun, Mahesh, Charan wish 'man of the masses'.. - Greatandhra
articles.description: Stars Allu Arjun, Mahesh Babu, and Ram Charan, to name a few, have wished Jr NTR, who will begin shooting for his next with 'KGF' director Prashanth Neel in August for a yet-untitled film, as he turned 41 on Monday.
